com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.notifications

Class Installation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.notifications.Installation

  • public class Installation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents device installation in Azure Notification Hub (https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/mt621153.aspx)

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • expirationTime

        public java.util.Date expirationTime
        Expiration time of the installation. Note this property is read-only for installation. The value can be set at the NotificationHub level on create or update, and will default to never expire (9999-12-31T23:59:59).

      • installationId

        public java.lang.String installationId
        Globally unique identifier of the installation

      • platform

        public java.lang.String platform
        Notification platform of the installation

      • pushChannel

        public java.lang.String pushChannel
        Registration Id, token or URI obtained from platform-specific notification service

      • pushChannelExpired

        public boolean pushChannelExpired
        Installation expired or not. Note this property is read-only for installation. It is ignored in installation create or update.

      • pushVariables

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pushVariables
        A collection of push variables

      • tags

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags
        A list of tags

      • templates

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,InstallationTemplate> templates
        A collection of templates

        Constructor for Installation
        Parameters:
        installationId - installation Id
        platform - platform

        pushVariables - a collection of push variables
